column4: i have been all over irc trying to find some help, and now i end up back where i started

i have a dual boot xp/maverick.    i installed a shell replacement called litestep on my windows xp. now i cant load into windows. not in safe mode, not regular not any way.   i want to use ubuntu to rearrange the sytstem files to fix windows.   i have found out i can,  but now i nedd someone familiar with litestep,  that help me with what to do on my windows partition mounted in ubuntu
im sure ill end up reinstalling,  but i sure would like to go at it through ubuntu
have you looked for a litestep channel?
